Package Manual.services

Class DepartmentService

java.lang.Object
Manual.services.BaseService<Department,​Long,​DepartmentRepo>
Manual.services.DepartmentService
public class DepartmentService extends BaseService<Department,​Long,​DepartmentRepo>
Class that models from DepartmentDTO using DepartmentMapper to be intermediary between the DepartmentController and the database
Author:
sps169, FedericoTB
